titles.title: Department of Defense Supplemental Military Construction Authorization Act, 1987
A bill to authorize additional construction at certain military installations for fiscal year 1987, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities.

bill.summary: 2/11/1987--Introduced. Department of Defense Supplemental Military Construction Authorization Act, 1987 - Title I: Army - Authorizes additional appropriations for FY 1987 to permit the Secretary of the Army to make expenditures to improve existing family housing units. Title II: Navy - Authorizes additional appropriations for FY 1987 to permit the Secretary of the Navy to make expenditures to improve existing family housing units. Authorizes the Secretary to acquire real property and carry out certain military construction projects. Title III: Air Force - Authorizes additional appropriations for FY 1987 to permit the Secretary of the Air Force to acquire real property and carry out certain military construction projects. Title IV: Defense Agencies - Authorizes additional appropriations for FY 1987 to permit the Secretary of Defense to acquire real property and carry out a certain military construction project.
